name: Charming Hanoi & Halong Bay 5 Days 4 Nights
description:
Totally different from other cities and  widely
acknowledged as one of the loveliest cities in Asia, Hanoi impress you right
after you landed at the  Noi Bai International airport and on the way to
your hotel located downtown of the city by its traffic, street shops, people
and people. This 1000 year-old city offer you an unique intermingle with a
French Indochina legacy wide, tree-lined boulevards, a cup of coffee at a
street pub. A combined trip to Halong Bay with an overnight stay on traditional
junk, some kayaking, swimming , seafood, cooking demonstration and  Tai
Chi lesson really make it a perfect trip.
